definition: variant of 洪福[hong2 fu2]
eastern bean goose/great/large
good fortune/happiness/luck
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: How often do you purchase Herbal Tea Series drinks?
sentences.chinese: 你一個月會買多少次鴻福堂的涼茶系列的飲品？

sentences.english: Will you buy Hung Fook Tong's bottle herbal teas in the future?
sentences.chinese: 你以後會打算購買鴻福堂樽裝涼茶嗎？

sentences.english: Where would you purchase the Herbal Tea Series?
sentences.chinese: 你會在那裏購買鴻福堂的涼茶系列的飲品？

sentences.english: What do you think the taste of the Herbal Tea Series?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得鴻福堂的涼茶系列的飲品的味道如何？

sentences.english: What do you think about the pricing of Herbal Tea Series?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得鴻福堂的涼茶系列的飲品價格如何？

sentences.english: Have you ever drink Hung Fook Tong's bottle herbal teas?
sentences.chinese: 你曾經飲用過鴻福堂樽裝涼茶嗎？

sentences.english: Do you like the out look of Hung Fook Tong's bottle herbal teas?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡鴻福堂樽裝涼茶的外型設計嗎？

definition: to arrive home/facing one's home/home-coming/(soccer) facing the goalmouth
surrounded by distinguished friends (idiom); in company
happiness and longevity
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
small capital, huge profit (idiom); to put in a little and get a lot out
May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
lit. (may you) have abundance year after year/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
promotion to the nobility (idiom)
Happy New Year
variant of 合家[he2 jia1]
may you enjoy boundless longevity (idiom)/long may you live
to bless and protect/to protect
joss stick and candle
old but still full of vitality (idiom)
bridal room and ornamented candles/wedding festivities (idiom)
